findBiomePosition

public ChunkPosition findBiomePosition(int par1,
                                       int par2,
                                       int par3,
                                       List par4List,
                                       Random par5Random)
Finds a valid position within a range, that is in one of the listed biomes. Searches {par1,par2} +-par3 blocks. Strongly favors positive y positions.
